sentences.en: Above all, it requires clairvoyant souls, without solace.
sentences.cn: 而且, 它需要无需慰藉的洞察力的灵魂.

sentences.en: And your sister has an idea about a clairvoyant librarian who uses her powers for evil.
sentences.cn: 您的妹妹觉得描述有透视能力的图书管理员用她的超能力干坏事的电视肯定很受欢迎.

sentences.en: Are you a clairvoyant or something?
Clairvoyant outfit - to avoid other company employees use eye too difficult, please check desk at work.
sentences.cn: 透视装 —— 为避免公司其他员工用眼过于费劲, 请上班时寄放总台.

sentences.en: He or she may be clairvoyant , a medium, and able to speak to the dead.
sentences.cn: 他或她可能是具有透视能力,是灵媒, 能和死者交谈.

sentences.en: I was going to attend clairvoyant's meeting, but it was cancelled due to unforseen events.
sentences.cn: 我本来要去参加个超感者大会, 结果会议因为一些不可预见的问题取消了.

sentences.en: If they do, it is no longer a visualisation but a clairvoyant vision.
sentences.cn: 如果他们看见的话, 这不再是观想,而是超视觉.

sentences.en: In order to reach these higher levels, some clairvoyant ability is required.
sentences.cn: 为了达到这些更高层次, 需要一些超视力.

sentences.en: It considered to offer new academic tool and clairvoyant point of view for politics.
sentences.cn: 它为政治学研究提供了新的理论工具和透视角度.

sentences.en: This warning applies to all clairvoyant visions in general, whether experienced in astral form or not.
sentences.cn: 总的来说,这适用于所有超视觉, 不论是否是在星体躯体中经验到的.

sentences.en: Those that are clairvoyant can read the scripts both non - ascending and ascending humans are now receiving.
sentences.cn: 透视者能阅读不提升和提升两种人正在接收的剧本.

sentences.en: Those whom are clairvoyant have often come to understand past lives.
sentences.cn: 那些能透视的人们已能经常理解死去的生命.
